#Guide for 2011 peoples

= Welcome 2011 GRAFers =

== Some things you might like to visit before getting started ==

 * [http://code.google.com/p/graf-framework/wiki/GrafFuture Future] - Where the 2011 project may be headed
 * [http://code.google.com/p/graf-framework/files/thesis.pdf Gregs thesis] - The inspiration for GRAF  
 * [http://code.google.com/p/graf-framework/wiki/Quickstartguide Quick Start Guide] - Installing GRAF 

=== To get you going ===

 * [http://code.google.com/p/graf-framework/wiki/grafIntro Models] - An explanation of some of the models supplied with GRAF
 * [http://code.google.com/p/graf-framework/wiki/howToAddModels Adding Models] - How to add models to GRAF
 *  [http://code.google.com/p/graf-framework/wiki/creatingRulesForGRAF Rules] - How to add rules to GRAF
 *  [http://code.google.com/p/graf-framework/wiki/TestingDebuggingGraphs Graphs] - How to test anything implemented using graphs
 * [http://code.google.com/p/graf-framework/wiki/rulenomatch Rule Matching] - How to solve a rule not found error

To change the side bar -> Go to 'Administer' then 'Wiki' and its near the bottom of the page!
